alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:26PM EDT until July 02 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SAMPSON AND CENTRAL CUMBERLAND COUNTIES... At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Godwin, or 14 miles east of Fayetteville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Godwin, Eastover, Roseboro, Stedman, Wade, Falcon, Autryville, Vander and Spivey`s Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
